precondition: The Windows 98 desktop is visible.
action: Click the "Start" button on the taskbar.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying a list of menus including "Programs", "Favorites", "Documents", "Settings", "Find", "Help", and "Run".

precondition: The "Printers" option is visible in the Start Menu's "Settings" submenu.
expected_results: The "Printers" folder will open and its window will be maximized.

precondition: The "Printers" folder window is open, displaying the "Add Printer" icon.
action: Double Left Click on the "Add Printer" icon.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box will open. This dialog box contains a title bar, an image of a printer, instructional text, and three buttons: "< Back", "Next >", and "Cancel".

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying the initial screen with instructions to begin the installation process.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will update to display a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "Back" button will become active.

precondition: The Add Printer Wizard window is open. The "Manufacturers" list on the left panel should have "AGFA" selected. The "Printers" list on the right panel should display a list of AGFA printer models.
action: Click on "AGFA-AccuSet 800SF v2013.108" in the "Printers" list.
expected_results: The selected printer model will be highlighted.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying lists for "Manufacturers:" and "Printers:". The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will proceed to the next step of the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers labeled "Manufacturers" and a list of printer models labeled "Printers".
action: Click the down arrow on the "Printers" list box.
expected_results: The list of printer models will scroll down, showing additional options.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" lists. The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The Add Printer Wizard window is open with the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" lists visible. The "AGFA" manufacturer is currently selected.
expected_results: The "Printers" list will be updated to display a list of HP printer models.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open with the "Printers" list box visible.
action: Move the mouse pointer over the down arrow button located to the right of the "Printers" list box.
expected_results: The mouse pointer will change to an arrow pointing down.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying the "Manufacturers" and "Printers" list boxes. The "Next >" button is active.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will advance to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers in the "Manufacturers" pane and a list of available "Printers" in the "Printers" pane.
action: Click the "HP" item in the "Manufacturers" list box.
expected_results: The "Printers" list box will update to display a list of HP printer models. An empty "Undo" window will appear to the right of the "Add Printer Wizard" window.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open with "HP" selected as the manufacturer in the "Manufacturers:" list box. The "Printers:" list box on the right displays available HP printer models.
action: Click on "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" in the "Printers:" list box.
expected_results: The selected printer model, "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS", will be highlighted.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open, displaying a list of printer manufacturers and models. The desired printer model is selected.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box will display a list of available ports for connection. The "Configure Port..." button will become available, and the "Have Disk..." button will no longer be visible.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays a list of available ports. The "LPT1: Printer Port" option is highlighted, and the "Next >" button is visible.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will proceed to the next step. The window will now display a text field labeled "Printer name:" pre-filled with "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS".

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays a text field labeled "Printer name:" pre-filled with the chosen printer name.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will update to a confirmation screen. The window will no longer prompt for a printer name, and the "Next >" button will be replaced with a "Finish" button.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and displays the "Do you want to print a test page?" prompt.
expected_results: The radio button selection will change from "Yes (recommended)" to "No", indicating that a test page will not be printed after the printer installation is complete.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" dialog box is open and the "Would you like to print a test page?" prompt is displayed.
expected_results: The Add Printer Wizard will proceed to the next step in the installation process.

precondition: The "Add Printer Wizard" window is open and the "Finish" button is active.
expected_results: The "Add Printer Wizard" window will close, and a "Copying Files" dialog box will appear. An "Insert Disk" error message will also appear, requesting the insertion of the "Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM".

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Insert Disk' is open, displaying the message: "Please insert the disk labeled 'Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM', and then click OK."
expected_results: The 'Insert Disk' dialog box will close, and a 'Copying Files...' window will appear.

precondition: A "Copying Files..." dialog box is open, indicating that the file "ICONLIB.DLL" cannot be found and prompting for the "Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM".
expected_results: The system will attempt to copy files from the CD-ROM drive.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Copying Files...' is open, displaying the message: 'The file 'ICONLIB.DLL' on 'Windows 98 Second Edition CD-ROM' cannot be found. Setup cannot find the source disk. Please make sure that the disk is inserted properly, and then click OK to continue.'
expected_results: The 'Copying Files...' dialog box will be replaced with a progress bar indicating the file copying process. A small 'Copying Files...' window will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: A dialog box titled "Copying Files..." is open, indicating an error finding the file 'ICONLIB.DLL' during the printer driver installation.
expected_results: The "Copying Files..." dialog box will close. An error message titled "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" will appear, stating that not all required files were copied. The error message will offer suggestions to resolve the issue.

precondition: An error message box titled "HP Color LaserJet 5/5M PS" is displayed.
expected_results: The error message box will close.
